description: The Shockwave 3D Asset component in Adobe Shockwave Player before 11.6.4.634 allows attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (memory corruption) via unspecified vectors, a different vulnerability than CVE-2012-0757, CVE-2012-0761, CVE-2012-0762, CVE-2012-0763, CVE-2012-0764, and CVE-2012-0766.
